welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sintra, a charming city known for its fairytale-like castles and palaces. Take your time to explore and enjoy the beautiful sights and rich history this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lisbon Portela Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Lisbon Portela Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 2 hours.
